**Gaining Admission to MBA**

Candidate to register for relevant program from [https://www.pessat.com/](https://www.pessat.com/) and complete the process to secure admission.

**Eligibility Criteria**

Atleast 50% in Bachelor‚Äôs degree from any recognized University. For additional info, refer [www.pes.edu/pessat](http://www.pes.edu/pessat)

**Method of Admission**

[PESSAT](https://www.pessat.com/) is an online interview process which must be attended by the candidates. Candidates must have their educational transcripts, supporting works/ documents (if any) and certifications (if any) ready to assist their candidature when they appear for the online interview process. Results will be shared with the candidates within 3 days after appearing for the online interview process. If selected, candidates can proceed with admissions. Further process of admissions will be shared with the shortlisted candidates after announcement of results.

Candidates with valid MAT/ CAT/ CMAT/ ATMA/ NMAT entrance exam scores should register from [www.pessat.com](http://www.pessat.com) and proceed accordingly.

PGCET quota admissions is applicable for this course for eligible candidates
